title: New account - cannot see or select any champions
body: Have created a new account but cannot see any champions in champ select - not even free rotation. Have just had two dodging bans because of this. What do i need to do?

replies.body:
Hey guys,

I just tested for this issue myself and was able to see all the free champs that low level accounts get in champ select. Is this issue still ongoing for you?
Can still only see the champ i bought with IP from battle training. Although am only level 1 or 2. Should there be more available?

You should be seeing a full 10 champions specifically set for players from level 1-10.

It's odd that I can see them and you can't. We've got a team investigating the issue now. Thanks for the report.

Hi Stompie, for now we've made the [normal free champion rotation](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-draven-janna-thresh-and-more) available for low level players, so you should at least being seeing those 14 champs available to you.
Thanks Gehirn - can now select the free rotation champs.

So i played the (painful) tutorial and battle training. This gave me some IP to purchase one champion (Annie). I can see her in games now. But if someone else was to lock her i would be screwed. Give it a go. Pretty flawed though. Definitely needs a fix.
This! I'm lvl 6 same issue but luckily had enough IP for Ashe

Happened after the update this morning for me. Everything was fine yesterday. Really bad luck for fresh accounts RITO pls fix. Also shouldn't you put this in help and support instead of gameplay and strategy.
It's happening to all players like under level 10 i feel. My mate had to spend RP just to get a champ because we couldn't play at all.
